directions: [["Combine all Sangria Base ingredients into sealable container, squeezing the fruit wedges as they are added"],["Mix well and chill overnight"],["Add ginger ale and ice right before serving, straining out fruit if desired"],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
